definition: lane (usually as part of a street name)/memorial archway

sentences.english: Joe gathered the boys and girls of the neighbourhood for a picnic.
sentences.chinese: 乔把街坊四邻的男孩和女孩们集合起来去野餐。

sentences.english: It asks us the teahouse as the centre of the neighbourhood.
sentences.chinese: 它叫我们茶馆作为街坊四邻的活动中心。

sentences.english: Burnt to cinders, we were told by the neighbourhood gossips.
sentences.chinese: 我们从街坊四邻的闲言碎语中得知他被烧成了灰。

sentences.english: It asks us to see the teahouse as the center of the neighbourhood.
sentences.chinese: 《茶馆》让我们茶馆作为街坊四邻的活动中心。

sentences.english: The noise upset the entire neighborhood.
sentences.chinese: 噪声闹得整个街坊四邻心烦意乱。

sentences.english: The fire alarmed all the neighbors on the street.
sentences.chinese: 火灾使整个街坊四邻都惊恐起来。

definition: neighbors/next-door neighbors/related work units/colleagues doing related work
fellow countryman (from the same village)/local people/villager/the folks back home
a relative (i.e. family relation)/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
see 左鄰右舍|左邻右舍[zuo3 lin2 you4 she4]
person from the same village, town or province/peasant (derog.)/(of a school of thought etc) follower
(neologism 2015) the Zhao family (derogatory term for those who hold power in the PRC)
